contents: Article 14 (Function) The committee responds to the advice of the Sports Council regarding the following tasks. Revised 2019. 1. 31. 1. Matters pertaining to the preparation of the Sports Competition 2. Matters relating to the selection of the venue for the Sports Competition 3. General matters relating to the organization and operation of the Sports Competition 4. Articles 11 and 12 Approval of the competition emblem established by the organizing committee pursuant to paragraph 1 and the insignia project using it 5. Other matters deemed necessary to achieve the purpose of establishing the committee 6. Deleted January 31, 2019
